name: begorrah
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of surprise or emphasis, sometimes used to suggest that someone sounds Irish: "Begorra!" he said. "I'll call you back!" People are just jealous, begorrah.
More examplesFewer examplesFaith, bejaysus and begorrah, it was terrible! Ah, begorra, you'll be wanting some information, will you?They've never heard anyone say "Begorrah".Enjoy cooking this dish and celebrate the spirit of the nation it comes from, begorrah.
